Description.Text:
Location
Tucked away from the neon lights but still surrounded by the excitement only Las Vegas can offer, the hotel is minutes away from all that glitters on the famous Las Vegas Boulevard or Fremont Street. It is located only minutes from McCarran International Airport and close to the action but tucked away from the noise and distraction of the gaming environment.
Facilities
This family-friendly club resort property is an ideal all-suite resort destination for both the leisure and business traveller as a non-gaming, service-oriented hotel. Renovated in 2010, the air-conditioned apartment hotel offers 148 suites and facilities include a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services, a hotel safe, games room and Internet access. Guests arriving by car may leave their vehicle in the car park.
Rooms
The spacious suites come with a queen-size bed in the master bedroom, a living room with sofa bed, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen including fridge, microwave, stove, dishwasher and tea and coffee making facilities, a laundry room with washer/dryer, and a private balcony or patio. They are also en suite with shower, bathtub and hairdryer. A direct dial telephone, satellite TV, a radio, Internet access, an ironing set and individually regulated air conditioning and heating also feature as standard.
Sports/Entertainment
The hotel offers an outdoor heated swimming pool with sun terrace and sun loungers, an outdoor hot tub, a gym and a games room.
Payment
American Express, MasterCard and VISA are accepted as methods of payment.
Misc.
There is a 24-hour front desk. Guests are expected to establish credit upon check-in for incidentals by major credit card or debit card with MasterCard or VISA symbol.
How to get there
From McCarran International Airport, take I-215 West to Decatur Boulevard then go North (right) at Decatur Boulevard. The resort is on the west (left) side of Decatur, just past Hacienda.

LocationTucked away from the neon lights but still surrounded by the excitement only Las Vegas can offer; the hotel is minutes away from all that glitters on the famous Las Vegas Boulevard or Fremont Street. It is located only minutes from McCarran International Airport and close to the action but tucked away from the noise and distraction of the gaming environment.
